body_html: @alicetragedy Orgas assume the role of admins on the teams app so they "overrule" the restrictions. We can change that, but would it not be enough to just leave the text input be as an orga person when they are not supervising a given team?
body_text: @alicetragedy Orgas assume the role of admins on the teams app so they "overrule" the restrictions. We can change that, but would it not be enough to just leave the text input be as an orga person when they are not supervising a given team?
